00222 class ScanlineAccessor {
00223     public:
00228         ScanlineAccessor(VirtualDisplay* display, XYDIM x, XYDIM y, XYDIM width) :
00229             m_display(display),
00230             m_count(width),
00231             m_xpos(0),
00232             m_x(x),
00233             m_y(y)
00234         {
00235         }
00236 
00238         BOOLEAN HasNext() { return (m_count > 0); };
00239 
00241         void Draw(UINT8 red, UINT8 green, UINT8 blue)
00242         {
00243             m_display->SetColor(Color(red, green, blue));
00244             m_display->SetPixel(m_x + m_xpos, m_y);
00245             m_xpos++;
00246             m_count--;
00247         }
00248         
00250         void Draw(ColorValue color)
00251         {
00252             m_display->SetColorValue(color);
00253             m_display->SetPixel(m_x + m_xpos, m_y);
00254             m_xpos++;
00255             m_count--;
00256         }
00257 
00261         void Next() {
00262             m_xpos++;
00263             m_count--;
00264         }
00265 
00266 
00267     private:
00269         XYDIM m_count;
00270         VirtualDisplay* m_display;
00271         XYDIM m_xpos;
00272         XYDIM m_x;
00273         XYDIM m_y;
00274 
00275 //  The optimized implementation for 16bpp displays is left in here for reference
00276 //
00277 //  public:
00278 //      ScanlineAccessor(VirtualDisplay* display, XYDIM x, XYDIM y, XYDIM width) :
00279 //          m_data((UINT16 GDI_HUGE*)display->GetBitmap()->GetBits()),
00280 //          m_count(width)
00281 //      {
00282 //          m_data += (display->GetScanlineAtomCount() >> 1) * y + x;
00283 //      }
00284 //

00287 //      void Draw(UINT8 red, UINT8 green, UINT8 blue)
00288 //      {
00289 //          *m_data = ((ColorValue)((((red) >> 3U) << 11U) | (((green) >> 2U) << 5U) | ((blue) >> 3U)));

00291 //          #if defined(APOXI_DISPLAY_FORMAT_BIG_ENDIAN)

00294 //          m_data++;
00295 //          m_count--;
